level.text: The Board of Review for good cause shown may waive any of the provisions of this chapter in any proceeding after advising the parties of its intention to order the waiver.
The provisions of this section shall not empower the Board to waive any provision required by statute.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: ยง31.1 of Regulation No. 73-13, approved May 24, 1973, 19 DCR 1147, 1153 (June 11, 1973), 25 DCRR ยง31.1.
